Name: TypeOfMaterial
Description: Designation of the type of material being described. Supports the use of a controlled vocabulary.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the referenced material. This field can map to a Dublin Core abstract. Note that Dublin Core does not support structure within the abstract element. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: Citation
Description: Bibliographic citation for the external resource.

Name: ExternalURLReference
Description: Contains a URL which indicates the location of the cited external resource.

Name: ExternalURNReference
Description: Contains a URN which identifies the cited external resource.

Name: Relationship
Description: Reference to the item within the DDI Instance to which the external resource is related.

Name: MIMEType
Description: Provides a standard Internet MIME type for use by processing applications.

Name: Segment
Description: Can describe a segment within a larger object such as a text or video segment.

Name: SizeInBytes
Description: Specifies the size of the file in bytes.

Name: Lang
Description: Language of the metadata describing the other material.
